promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive rare dragon psychic-type pokemon holding a ancient club. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or dragon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Clubiora, a a massive rare dragon psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Mega Burn. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragon", "psychic" or "Clubiora". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, dragon-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: Mysterious and mighty, Clubiora roams deep caverns, using its Mega Burn to illuminate paths. It dazzles foes with an intense mental surge.
